Software Craftsmanship North America

  • Archived source: https://web.archive.org/web/20101112134833/http://scna.softwarecraftsmanship.org/

  • Snapshot timestamp: 2010-11-12 19:48:33 UTC

Archive Snapshot

Chicago, IL - October 15-16, 2010 Home Venue Speakers Schedule Sponsorship Software Craftsmanship
North America 2010 Join Software Craftsmanship North America 2010 (SCNA) as a forerunner to the
Craftsmanship movement! CHICAGO, IL OCTOBER 15-16, 2010 Register Now! Why attend? SCNA returns to
present myriad opportunities for those skilled craftsmen as well as those working toward mastery in
the field. Come to develop your software skills and techniques, or meet other companies who take
quality and skill seriously, or find future craftsmen for your company. InfoQ interviews Dave Hoover
about Software Craftsmanship North America SEE: Presentations from prominent members of the software
craftsmanship community, leading concepts in Software Craftsmanship, and future strategies in
software development. SPONSORSHIP: Share your vision and promote your brand to key people in the
industry. NETWORK: Establish new relationships with other craftsmen and companies that are
influential in the craftsmanship movement. SCNA 2010 is being organized by Corey Haines -
@coreyhaines Dave Hoover - @redsquirrel Micah Martin - @slagyr Angelique Martin - @angethouvenin
Paul Pagel - @paulwpagel Kevin Taylor - @ktaylor Cancellation Policy Pricing Early Bird: $395 (ends
Aug 22nd!) Regular: $495 (ends Oct 12th) Last Minute/Walkin: $545 Register Now! Featured Sponsors
